Frame.definition: to formulate the contents of and draw up
Frame.origin: [in the two hundred years since our Constitution was framed "W. J. Brennan, Jr."]

1.definition: to formulate the contents of and draw up (as a document) [in the two hundred years since our Constitution was"W. J. Brennan, Jr."]

2.definition: to contrive the evidence against (as an innocent person) so that a verdict of guilty is assured
